rules_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one –
• Lich’s Confidant makes an experience check. [i](Exile a card from your graveyard with mana value greater than this creature’s power to put a +1/+1 counter on it.)[/i]
• Return a card exiled with Lich’s Confidant to its owner’s hand. You lose life equal to that card’s mana value.
